rows.title: Welcome!
rows.message_text: This app is meant to be a mentor and a source of resources for teachers of early mathematics. The Introduction will tell you all you need to know to get started.

rows.title: Introduction
rows.message_text: Go to the Instroduction to learn all about this app and see some examples of how to use it.

rows.title: Topics
rows.message_text: This is a collection of math topics in the teaching of early mathematics. This collection is the center of everything in the app. There are extensive links between the topics and the resources in this app.

rows.title: Resources
rows.message_text: These are collections of teaching tasks and lessons.

rows.title: Help
rows.message_text: If you ever want to see this introduction again, just click on the question mark.
